title: Debugging
alt: When you Google an error message and it gets no results, you can be pretty sure you've found a clue to the location of Martin's sword.
transcript:
[Cueball and White Hat are walking, while Cueball holds a hand out while talking.]
Cueball: I was trying to figure out why my browser was acting weird.[In a frame-less panel they keep in walking, Cueball holds both hands up in front of him.]
Cueball: Turns out it wasn't the browser-the issue was with my keyboard driver.[Zoom in on Cueball's upper torso as he is holding a finger up.]
Cueball: Debugging that led me to a mysterious error message from a system utility...[Zoom out as Cueball holds up a miniature sword by the blade in one hand. White Hat turns his head around and looks at it while they keep walking.]
Cueball: Anyway, long story short, I found the sword of Martin the Warrior.
White Hat: I think at some point there you switched puzzles.
